alert.note: Alert for Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Coalinga - Avenal; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 7:07PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL KINGS AND SOUTH CENTRAL FRESNO COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM PDT... At 706 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Avenal, or 27 miles southwest of Hanford, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huron, Lemoore NAS, and Kettleman City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Coalinga - Avenal; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties
